text: thumb Hotel Plaza Athénée is a 5-star hotel at 37 East 64th Street between Park Avenue and Madison Avenue on the Upper East Side of Manhattan, New York City, US. Built in 1984, it has 143 guest rooms. It is owned by Thai billionaire Charoen Sirivadhanabhakdi. ==References== Category:The Leading Hotels of the World Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1984 Category:Hotels established in 1984 Category:Hotels in Manhattan Category:1984 establishments in New York (state) Category:Upper East Side
title: Plaza Athénée, New York
